attributes.action: force the resignation of the Speaker of the House of Commons Mr Michael Martin MP
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: British House of Commons Speaker Michael Martin should resign over questionable expense claims by himself & members of Parliament, we believe Michael Martin and many other MPs have been plundering the public purse for an almost grotesque array of personal perks.

rejection.details: Speaker Michael Martin announced on May 19 he will step down in June.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
